en:
Chicago braces as historic snowstorm bears down Monday. Dangerous winter conditions threaten Monday morning commute as intense bands could dump over a foot of snow
The post Chicago braces as historic snowstorm bears down Monday appeared first on Rolling Out.

title: What is lake-effect snow? Here’s how climate change is altering it
description: Warmer waters are fueling stronger, snowier storms—at least for now. Here’s how scientists think this phenomenon will evolve as the planet gets hotter.
content:
The models all suggest that in the short run, maybe we'll get more lake-effect or lake snow, but eventually the air just becomes too warm and it all becomes mostly rain, Burnett explains. 
While som… [+900 chars]

en: What is lake-effect snow? Here’s how climate change is altering it. Warmer waters are fueling stronger, snowier storms—at least for now. Here’s how scientists think this phenomenon will evolve as the planet gets hotter.

title: Denver ties mark Friday for second-latest date for a first snowfall

Dezember zu erreichen, sind gering.

title: Hundreds of flights have been canceled after a snowstorm struck on one of the busiest travel weekends of the year

content:
Jim Vondruska/Getty Images
  • Hundreds of flights have been canceled on Sunday after a snowstorm hit the Midwest.
  • Chicago's O'Hare airport has seen the most cancellations and delays.

content: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (WOOD) Fresh off a snowy weekend, a new winter storm watchhas been issued for Monday night, targeting three West Michigan Counties: Ottawa, Muskegon, and Oceana. Lake-effect snow … [+1547 chars]
de: Drei Landkreise rechnen am Montagabend mit 6 bis 12 Zoll mehr Schnee. Frisch nach einem verschneiten Wochenende wurde für Montagnacht eine neue Wintersturmwarnung herausgegeben, die auf drei West Michigan Counties abzielt: Ottawa, Muskegon und Oceana...

title: Palm Springs Aerial Tramway snow guessing contest comes to end with season's first inch
description: The contest asks tram fans to guess the date on which the first inch of snow will be measured at the top of the tram each year.
content:
The storm system that moved through Southern California on Saturday, Nov. 15, brought rain, flooding and even mudslides to the Coachella Valley.
But it was a different story atop the Palm Springs Ae… [+2014 chars]
de: Der Schneeratenwettbewerb der Palm Springs Aerial Tramway geht mit dem ersten Zoll der Saison zu Ende. Bei dem Wettbewerb werden Straßenbahnfans aufgefordert, das Datum zu erraten, an dem jedes Jahr der erste Zentimeter Schnee an der Spitze der Straßenbahn gemessen wird.
en: Palm Springs Aerial Tramway snow guessing contest comes to end with season's first inch. The contest asks tram fans to guess the date on which the first inch of snow will be measured at the top of the tram each year.
la: Fontes palmarum Aerial Tramway nix coniectura certaminis cum primo inch tempore finitur. Certamen tram quaerit fans ut coniecto tempus quo prima inch nivis in summitate tram singulis annis mensurabitur.

title: Travel ban issued for Ohio Turnpike: details
description: Ahead of high winds, rain and snow, the Ohio Turnpike and Infrastructure Commission has issued a travel ban for the toll road the Ohio Turnpike.
content:
(WJW) Ahead of forecasted high winds, rain and snow, the Ohio Turnpike and Infrastructure Commission has issued a travel ban for the toll road the Ohio Turnpike.

de: Reiseverbot für Ohio Turnpike: Einzelheiten. Angesichts starker Winde, Regen und Schnee hat die Ohio Turnpike and Infrastructure Commission ein Fahrverbot für die Mautstraße Ohio Turnpike erlassen.
en: Travel ban issued for Ohio Turnpike: details. Ahead of high winds, rain and snow, the Ohio Turnpike and Infrastructure Commission has issued a travel ban for the toll road the Ohio Turnpike.
